description:
Mr. Gab announces that the school will be holding a bazaar to raise money for a school pool, and the students are to bring items from home that they no longer need... but on the day of the bazaar, none of the items brought in are selling well. The principal is disheartened, but a bite to the bottom gives him an idea that could save the bazaar! Will they raise enough to build a school pool?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 大騒ぎ!? ドキドキパニックバザー
